author: Marti
content:
Hi Andreas,

As fall is slowly making it's way into the southeastern USA, you image for today is such a lovely reminder that autumn is on the way. I'm such a sucker for fall crops and the colors they bring. And, at the end of the week, I will be in Jackson Wyoming where fall -- and a wee bit of snow in the mountains -- has already arrived.

Thank you for such a lovely reminder that the seasons are changing and autumn is here. Have a great one!!
